item.title: By: Reb Yudel
item.dc:creator: Reb Yudel
item.description: Is the model really appropriate? Are Day Schools offering opportunities for children of deprived backgrounds, or are they Madrasas designed to radicalize the children of the middle class?
item.content:encoded: Is the model really appropriate? Are Day Schools offering opportunities for children of deprived backgrounds, or are they Madrasas designed to radicalize the children of the middle class?
